tagline: Bikes, Canals, Culture – Discover Amsterdam Your Way
seoDescription: Plan your Amsterdam getaway with Koala Escapes. Find unique hotels, local tips, and easy booking options.
intro: Amsterdam isn’t just tulips and bicycles — though there’s plenty of both! It’s a city full of cozy charm, buzzing art scenes, and scenic canals that wind through neighborhoods like Jordaan and De Pijp. Whether you’re sipping a coffee by the water or cycling past 17th-century houses, Amsterdam invites you to slow down and explore.
